original_text: The descendants of Gershon received these towns in land that belonged to the other half tribe of Manasseh: Golan in Bashan with its fields and Ashtaroth with its fields.
korean_text: 게르손 자손에게는 므낫세 반 지파 종족 중에서 바산의 골란과 그 초원과 아스다롯과 그 초원을 주고

sentences.original_text: The descendants of Gershon received these towns
in land that belonged to the other half tribe of Manasseh
sentences.korean_translation: 므낫세 지파의 다른 반쪽에게 속한 땅에서

sentences.original_text: Golan in Bashan with its fields
